description.value:
Choose a bloodline that gives you your spellcasting talent. This choice determines the type of spells you cast and the spell list you choose them from, additional spells you learn, and additional trained skills. You also gain Focus Points and special focus spells based on your bloodline. The bloodlines presented in this book are as follows.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Bloodline: Aberrant]{Bloodline: Aberrant}

A strange and unknowable influence gives you occult spells.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Bloodline: Angelic]{Bloodline: Angelic}

Holy grace bestows divine spells upon you.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Bloodline: Demonic]{Bloodline: Demonic}

A sinful corruption gives you divine spells.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Bloodline: Diabolic]{Bloodline: Diabolic}

A bond with devils gives you divine spells.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Bloodline: Draconic]{Bloodline: Draconic}

The blood of dragons grants you arcane spells.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Bloodline: Elemental]{Bloodline: Elemental}

The power of the elements manifests in you as primal spells.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Bloodline: Fey]{Bloodline: Fey}

Influence from the fey gives you primal spells.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Bloodline: Hag]{Bloodline: Hag}

The blight of a hag has given you occult spells.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Bloodline: Imperial]{Bloodline: Imperial}

An ancient power grants you arcane spells.

@Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Bloodline: Undead]{Bloodline: Undead}

The touch of death gives you divine spells.
